para.verbatim:
.. module:: Helper :platform: Unix :synopsis: Python code shared by all the scripts to manage transitions from one fsm state to another
.. moduleauthor:: Matteo Carlone <matteo.carlone99@gmail.com>
This Module implements specific methods necessary for many program funcionalities:
* ROS service-clients * ROS action-clients * ROS messages Callbacks * Functions to return the FSM transition states * Other generic functions used in more than one script
